page.description: Defines a Text Box with auto advance.
page.discussion: The + directive defines a Text Box with auto advance. An auto-advance field is one where the cursor will jump to the next field when the current field is full. To enable auto-advance, you must specify the maximum characters of a field, and you must specify '+' in the field's format string.

section.title: Example
